column1: Appendix table 3. Number of sentenced prisoners under jurisdiction of state or federal correctional authorities, December 31, 2000, 2006 and 2007
Authors: Heather C. West and William J. Sabol, Ph.D.
Appendix table 3. Number of sentenced prisoners under jurisdiction of state or federal correctional authorities, December 31, 2000, 2006 and 2007
Note: Sentenced prisoner is defined as a prisoner sentenced to more than 1 year.
~Not applicable. As of December 31,2001, sentenced felons from the District of Columbia were the responsibility of the Federal Bureau of Prisons.
a/Totals estimated. Illinois did not provide data in 2006 and 2007. Maine and Nevada did not provide data in 2007.
b/Prisons and jails form one integrated system. Data include total jail and prison populations.
c/Includes some inmates sentenced to 1 year or less.
